page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: My name is Sharon Workman and I am ten years old.I used to be a Brownie but I have just joined the Guides. On Monday at 6.30p.m. I go to Guides.I like going to Guides because it is fun and you learn new things.The Guiders are kind. When we go camping we learn interesting things like how to make a camp-fire and how to cook food.We use a little grill. When we get back from camping we play games to warm us up. You learn things at Guides by doing badges.I am working for my Safety at Home Badge.I am learning about fire prevention.
